meanings.definition: The quality or state of being imponderable.
meanings.sent1: The imponderabilities of the universe fascinate scientists.
meanings.sent2: We discussed the imponderabilities of life over coffee.
meanings.sent3: The imponderabilities of cats always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter floated through the room like imponderabilities.
meanings.sent5: The imponderabilities of the ocean depths are mysterious.

meanings.sent1: Philosophers ponder the imponderabilities of existence.
meanings.sent2: The book delves into the imponderabilities of human behavior.
meanings.sent3: The imponderabilities of the weather keep meteorologists on their toes.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts drifted like imponderabilities in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The imponderabilities of the cosmos are beyond our comprehension.
